What is Verus Desktop, and what features does it support?

Verus Desktop is a software application that supports Vault and Marketplace interfaces. With Verus Desktop, users can lock up their funds in a VerusID using Vault, or create and take offers on VerusIDs using the Marketplace interface.

Verus Desktop with Vault and Marketplace Interfaces
Verus Desktop now supports Vault and Marketplace with interfaces. Anyone can lock up their funds in a VerusID with Vault, or make and take offers on VerusIDs. Download the latest version v0.9.0–4 here.
